info.name: Sousetsuka Dark Theme
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.5 - Search bar is now colored to match the rest of the page & message about stolen content is the same color as the background (should be for most times it shows up. this is how it is suppose to be but because I changed the background color was not the case).
Version 1.4 - No more black text on the sidebar & tags are no longer completely white.
Version 1.3 - Added the ability to enable/disable box shadows.
Version 1.2 - Fixed 'Projects' Hover menu.
version 1.1 - Added the ability to customized the color of the menubar & sidebar.
Version 1.0 - Released.
